text:
Nicola Zingaretti (born 11 October 1965) is an Italian politician. He has served as President of Lazio since 2013 and Secretary of the Democratic Party since 2019. He was a member of the European Parliament from 2004 to 2008, and served as president of the Province of Rome from 2008 to 2012.
Zingaretti was born in Rome. His mother was Jewish. His older brother is actor Luca Zingaretti. He is married and has two children.
On 7 March 2020, during the coronavirus pandemic in Italy, it was announced that Zingaretti had tested positive to COVID-19.
